title: My son has a pixel 2 the screen went black, none of the steps that I have taken to reset are working
content: I have held the power on button for 30 seconds. I have also held the power on with the volume down button. The phone it's vibrating when he puts his finger on the reader to unlock, do it seems it is a screen issue. I also tried putting pressure on the screen to reconnect any potential loose connections.
